articles.author: Imran Ahmed
articles.title: When we held up a mirror to Elon Musk's Twitter/X he tried to sue us into silence - The Guardian
articles.description: My organisation is standing up to the tech billionaires whose social media platforms are full of hate and lies
articles.content: It started with childish name-calling on Twitter two weeks ago, when Elon Musk called my organisation evil and me personally a rat. It has since escalated to a lawsuit filed against the Center for Co… [+5667 chars]
